name: Lift Off!
description:
This simple game is about making it past the asteroid field to reach your supply station in one piece. This game was built as a learning resource. You can learn how to build the low poly assets and a fun lift off animation in Blender here: https://cgcookie.com/course/build-and-animate-a-low-poly-rocket-in-blender-for-beginners

Afterward you can learn how to build the game you see here within this course: https://cgcookie.com/course/create-a-rocketship-video-game-in-unity

Controls

Controls are simple, you can only move left or right using the A or D keys or the Left and Right Arrow keys. Movement of the ship upward is controlled automatically after the lift off sequence plays.
